data.title: X-V madness
data.statement: We really hate some vowels right? Let's just replace them.

testCases.title: Long
testCases.testIn: NEQUE PORRO QUISQUAM EST QUI DOLOREM IPSUM QUIA DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUR, ADIPISCI VELIT
testCases.testOut: NXQVX PXRRX QVISQVVM XST QVI DXLXRXM IPSVM QVIV DXLXR SIT VMXT, CXNSXCTXTVR, VDIPISCI VXLIT

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: EST VITAE VELIT QUI INVENTORE ENIM VEL GALISUM OMNIS ET ENIM CUMQUE AD QUAERAT IPSUM NON VERO ULLAM. ET INTERNOS IPSUM ID CULPA PRAESENTIUM UT IPSUM IPSA.
testCases.testOut: XST VITVX VXLIT QVI INVXNTXRX XNIM VXL GVLISVM XMNIS XT XNIM CVMQVX VD QVVXRVT IPSVM NXN VXRX VLLVM. XT INTXRNXS IPSVM ID CVLPV PRVXSXNTIVM VT IPSVM IPSV.

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: CUPCAKE IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET. CAKE CANDY BISCUIT SWEET TOOTSIE ROLL MACAROON BEAR CLAW COOKIE. CHOCOLATE BAR CROISSANT JELLY-O DRAGÉE TOFFEE. BROWNIE GUMMIES PASTRY DONUT FRUITCAKE PIE BROWNIE. CHOCOLATE BAR PUDDING JELLY-O BEAR CLAW CAKE SWEET ROLL JELLY BEANS TOOTSIE ROLL CHUPA CHUPS. JELLY CHOCOLATE MARZIPAN SOUFFLÉ JUJUBES MACAROON TOOTSIE ROLL PIE. FRUITCAKE CARAMELS GUMMI BEARS BROWNIE DANISH LOLLIPOP. HALVAH PIE JUJUBES CHOCOLATE BAR PUDDING CROISSANT ICING CAKE FRUITCAKE. JELLY JELLY ICING BROWNIE CROISSANT. TOOTSIE ROLL DONUT CAKE PASTRY SHORTBREAD GUMMIES CHOCOLATE CAKE BEAR CLAW. OAT CAKE JELLY BEANS TOFFEE TOFFEE FRUITCAKE MUFFIN BEAR CLAW. JELLY BEANS PUDDING GUMMI BEARS TOPPING CARROT CAKE GUMMIES PIE CARAMELS DESSERT. CHOCOLATE DESSERT BISCUIT JELLY BEANS GUMMIES PIE.
testCases.testOut: CVPCVKX IPSVM DXLXR SIT VMXT. CVKX CVNDY BISCVIT SWXXT TXXTSIX RXLL MVCVRXXN BXVR CLVW CXXKIX. CHXCXLVTX BVR CRXISSVNT JXLLY-X DRVGÉX TXFFXX. BRXWNIX GVMMIXS PVSTRY DXNVT FRVITCVKX PIX BRXWNIX. CHXCXLVTX BVR PVDDING JXLLY-X BXVR CLVW CVKX SWXXT RXLL JXLLY BXVNS TXXTSIX RXLL CHVPV CHVPS. JXLLY CHXCXLVTX MVRZIPVN SXVFFLÉ JVJVBXS MVCVRXXN TXXTSIX RXLL PIX. FRVITCVKX CVRVMXLS GVMMI BXVRS BRXWNIX DVNISH LXLLIPXP. HVLVVH PIX JVJVBXS CHXCXLVTX BVR PVDDING CRXISSVNT ICING CVKX FRVITCVKX. JXLLY JXLLY ICING BRXWNIX CRXISSVNT. TXXTSIX RXLL DXNVT CVKX PVSTRY SHXRTBRXVD GVMMIXS CHXCXLVTX CVKX BXVR CLVW. XVT CVKX JXLLY BXVNS TXFFXX TXFFXX FRVITCVKX MVFFIN BXVR CLVW. JXLLY BXVNS PVDDING GVMMI BXVRS TXPPING CVRRXT CVKX GVMMIXS PIX CVRVMXLS DXSSXRT. CHXCXLVTX DXSSXRT BISCVIT JXLLY BXVNS GVMMIXS PIX.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: QUO EXPLICABO TEMPORA NON FUGIAT VOLUPTATES QUI DOLORES TEMPORE SED DOLOR CONSEQUATUR ET DEBITIS PLACEAT NON QUOD ATQUE. ET UNDE IPSUM AUT DIGNISSIMOS EVENIET AUT INVENTORE POSSIMUS AB LIBERO INVENTORE IN NIHIL REICIENDIS QUI VOLUPTAS VENIAM NAM REPELLENDUS REPELLAT? EST ENIM DELECTUS UT QUOD INTERNOS QUI ASPERNATUR NIHIL. ET SIMILIQUE AUTEM UT LABORUM PRAESENTIUM EST CORPORIS EARUM QUI PLACEAT TEMPORIBUS SED ALIAS CONSEQUUNTUR NAM VOLUPTATEM QUOD.
testCases.testOut: QVX XXPLICVBX TXMPXRV NXN FVGIVT VXLVPTVTXS QVI DXLXRXS TXMPXRX SXD DXLXR CXNSXQVVTVR XT DXBITIS PLVCXVT NXN QVXD VTQVX. XT VNDX IPSVM VVT DIGNISSIMXS XVXNIXT VVT INVXNTXRX PXSSIMVS VB LIBXRX INVXNTXRX IN NIHIL RXICIXNDIS QVI VXLVPTVS VXNIVM NVM RXPXLLXNDVS RXPXLLVT? XST XNIM DXLXCTVS VT QVXD INTXRNXS QVI VSPXRNVTVR NIHIL. XT SIMILIQVX VVTXM VT LVBXRVM PRVXSXNTIVM XST CXRPXRIS XVRVM QVI PLVCXVT TXMPXRIBVS SXD VLIVS CXNSXQVVNTVR NVM VXLVPTVTXM QVXD.

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string [[text]] in which we want to replace vowels like 'A','E','O','U' by 'X' and 'V'.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> The string obtained after vowel replacement.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

We really hate some vowels right? Let's just replace them.
Input
Line 1: A string text in which we want to replace vowels like 'A','E','O','U' by 'X' and 'V'.
Output
Line 1: The string obtained after vowel replacement.
Constraints
0 < [[text] < 1024
Example
Input
RAVEN
Output
RVVXN
